itunes:title: #144: How to Let Your Partner Have Their Own Feelings
title: #144: How to Let Your Partner Have Their Own Feelings
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: Your partner is their own person with their own feelings. But sometimes those feelings can be triggering to us even when they don't intend it to be. In this episode, we go over 3 things to keep in mind to help you allow your partner to have their own...
itunes:summary:
Your partner is their own person with their own feelings. But sometimes those feelings can be triggering to us even when they don't intend it to be.

In this episode, we go over 3 things to keep in mind to help you allow your partner to have their own emotional experience. 

 

Ready to let your loved ones in or provide space for those who want to love you? Check out the Let Them Love You Workshop to gain skills and make love easier.

Register for the Let Them Love You Workshop

RESOURCES MENTIONED

  • Join our weekly text inspiration list by texting PODCAST to 832-219-7815
  • Enroll in our Coaching Signature Program for single and partnered women: From Addicted & Avoidant to Available
  • Come to our next Healed and Loved Woman Retreat


CONNECT WITH US ELSEWHERE
